game.title: The Lost Village
game.objective: Find the lost village of Elrendar.
game.description: A small village, Elrendar, has been missing for several weeks. The villagers have been searching for it, but to no avail. You have been hired to find the lost village and bring back any survivors.
game.reward: 500 gold, a magical item, and the gratitude of the villagers.

task.objective: Travel to the village of Elrendar.
task.description: The village of Elrendar is located in the forest of Elvenwood, a few days' journey from the town of Ashwood.
Once you arrive at the village, search for any signs of life. Look for footprints, abandoned belongings, or any other clues that might lead you to the missing villagers.
If you find the missing villagers, convince them to return with you to Ashwood. Be prepared to fight off any enemies that might try to stop you.
